column5: Well, not much more I can add to the other posts...it was good to meet lots of new people, but as always never enough time to really talk to most of them.    I do want to thank Kevin and Leslie for yet another great week (alomost week , Chris and Glen, Joe and Art and BassmasterMike for taking me out fishing, and thanks also goes to Don (Deg) for picking up Beans and I for the fish fry. I think i'll let the pictures do the rest of my talking for me, but will apologize for the quality of some  My first fish of the week.....also the year    Glen and Chris   Rich, Tyler and Don   Beans                                       Lexxington and his brother Bo   BassmasterMike   Our host Kevin   Loonietoon   Daplumma   Nanook   Dano   Chris and Allan the cook
Great report Maureen! Congrats on the first of the year   hopefully there will be a lot more for ya!  Thanks  Whopper
Congrats on your first fish!Hopefully now that you have broken the ice, you will catch alot more this season.
Super stuff Maureen.  Glad you and Beans were our neighbours.. till the next event
great report, thanks for posting pics.
Hello Maureen. It was good to finally meet you at Lakair  . Maybe next year we will have more time to yak.
thanks Maureen for all your greetings and hospitality it meant a lot
